name: Roguemance
description: Roguemance is a roguelite with romance. Each battle is a date! Meet love interests, fight relationship problems and make heart-breaking decisions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
